title: Competition for the Villainess After Her Engagement Annulment - Novel Updates
tags: Broken Engagement   Dragon Riders   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Knights   Male Yandere   Nobles   Oneshot   Possessive Characters   Reverse Harem   Schemes And Conspiracies   Short Story   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Karasuma Jo   Karasumaji You   烏丸じょう
description:
Fiorentina, a duke’s daughter, has her engagement with the Prince annulled and is unjustly denounced for crimes she did not commit. She is then exiled.

But waiting for her at her destination is the person who betrayed her…>
